channel.title: Need Help with PI Client
channel.description:
I get this error whenever I run ANY PI Client:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Jframe Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Jframe at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Jframe. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Need Help with PI Client
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

Post in right section to start with…

And maybe read the error? :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with PI Client
item.dc:creator: @Gizmo1m Gizmo1m
item.description:
@Gizmo1m wrote:

I get This Error Now:

@echo off
title Client
cd ./Class/
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with PI Client
item.dc:creator: @X_Entinity_X X Entinity X
item.description:
@X_Entinity_X wrote:

There’s no Jframe so delete it in your Run.bat if your useing Wnd7:

@echo off title Client cd ./Class/ "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause
Windows XP
@echo off Title Client cd ./Class/ START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 exit
Also wrong section.

Read full topic
